object1.name: desktop
object1.discription: in parallel with 'laptop', is a stationary personal computer

object2.name: tablet
object2.discription: in parallel with 'laptop', is a portable touchscreen device

object3.name: smartphone
object3.discription: in parallel with 'laptop', is a portable touchscreen phone with advanced computing capabilities

object4.name: notebook
object4.discription: in parallel with 'laptop', is a small book for writing notes

object5.name: e-reader
object5.discription: in parallel with 'laptop', is a portable device for reading digital books

object6.name: calculator
object6.discription: in parallel with 'laptop', is a small electronic device for performing mathematical calculations

object7.name: typewriter
object7.discription: in parallel with 'laptop', is a mechanical or electromechanical machine for typing text

object8.name: projector
object8.discription: in parallel with 'laptop', is a device that projects images or videos onto a screen or surface
